message.description: the last message from an invocation image or runtime

modified.description: The date last modified, as an ISO-8601 Extended Format date string, as specified in the ECMAScript standard

outputs.description: List of output names generated by the last action.

started.description: The date when execution of the operation started, as an ISO-8601 Extended Format date string, as specified in the ECMAScript standard

status.description: The status of the last action

stopped.description: The date when execution of the operation stopped, as an ISO-8601 Extended Format date string, as specified in the ECMAScript standard

action.description: the name of the action. One of the built-ins (install, uninstall, upgrade) or a custom action.

bundleReference.description: A canonical reference to the bundle used in the last action

created.description: The date created, as an ISO-8601 Extended Format date string, as specified in the ECMAScript standard

parameters.description: key/value pairs of parameter name to parameter value.

result.description: The result of the last action
